author: bayard
msg: IO made dependent on the current 1.1 pre-release of Lang.
This isn't exactly too stunning, but as IO is not going to release before then,
it let's me Predicate' the FileFilters.

author: bayard
msg: StreamUtils is redundant, all the functionality is in IOUtils.
ProxyStreams are needed as FilterStream's are not 'honest' about
calling the same method that was called upon themselves. I find this
CountingOutput/TeeOutput both changed to be Proxy's.
